snippet: Battleground Texas’s goal was to make the state competitive, but when State Senator Wendy Davis, a Democrat, announced her candidacy, their fates became intertwined.
abstract: Democratic State Sen Wendy Davis is trying to absorb Battleground Texas, grass-roots political organization trying to make state competitive, as her field operation in her race for governor; that has put added scrutiny on group and created sometimes awkward dynamic between Davis and Battleground Texas volunteers; group may lose some momentum if Davis loses to Republican opponent Greg Abbott.
lead_paragraph: Battleground Texas’s goal was to make the state competitive, but when State Senator Wendy Davis, a Democrat, announced her candidacy, their fates became intertwined.

headline.main: For Democrats, Texas Push Gets an Early Shove
headline.print_headline: For Democrats, Texas Push Gets an Early Shove
